channel.title: Which Runescape is recommended to play?
channel.description:
Just curious on the outcome of this; Im thinking of playing again but not sure which 1. I got an account on both combat levels in the 100s. I like money making, questing, playing mini games, boss hunting and pking. Just can't make my mind lol.
Feel free to post a reply of your opinion! :D

item.source: Which Runescape is recommended to play?

item.title: Which Runescape is recommended to play?
item.dc:creator: @whackatre Whackatre
item.description:
@whackatre wrote:

I started playing RS in 2006 and it was a very fun game. I stopped playing a few years later and only played on and off to do things like dungeoneering since I was F2P and it was the only thing I could do.

I came back this summer and while I was at first confused by EoC, I ultimately thought it was far superior to the old combat system. That, and also the ease of playing and training skills were some of the factors that led me to continue playing. There is much less of a grind.

Since you mentioned you liked PKing, you should try it in EoC. It’s really fun despite what everybody else says.

I like RS3 gameplay and OSRS graphics!

Read full topic
item.source: Which Runescape is recommended to play?
